1.name: Inception
1.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

2.name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
2.description: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.

3.name: Iron Man 2
3.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

4.name: Tron
4.description: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

5.name: Shutter Island
5.description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

6.name: Black Swan
6.description: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

7.name: Legion
7.description: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

8.name: How to Train Your Dragon
8.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

9.name: Tangled
9.description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

10.name: The Social Network
10.description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site. That would become known as Facebook but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

11.name: Kick-Ass
11.description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

12.name: Easy A
12.description: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

13.name: True Grit
13.description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

14.name: Srpski film
14.description: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

15.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
15.description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

16.name: Room in Rome
16.description: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.

17.name: Grown Ups
17.description: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

18.name: The Town
18.description: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the F.B.I. Agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

19.name: Love & Other Drugs
19.description: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

20.name: Toy Story 3
20.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

21.name: Alice in Wonderland
21.description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

22.name: Blue Valentine
22.description: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

23.name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
23.description: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

24.name: Insidious
24.description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

25.name: Clash of the Titans
25.description: Perseus demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

26.name: Robin Hood
26.description: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

27.name: The Other Guys
27.description: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

28.name: Incendies
28.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

29.name: Burlesque
29.description: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

30.name: She's Out of My League
30.description: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

31.name: The Last Airbender
31.description: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

32.name: Sex and the City 2
32.description: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

33.name: The Karate Kid
33.description: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

34.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
34.description: The spectre of a dead child rapist haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

35.name: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
35.description: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

36.name: The King's Speech
36.description: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

37.name: Hot Tub Time Machine
37.description: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

38.name: Jonah Hex
38.description: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

39.name: Predators
39.description: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

40.name: RED
40.description: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

41.name: Despicable Me
41.description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

42.name: Centurion
42.description: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

43.name: I Spit on Your Grave
43.description: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.

44.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
44.description: A young fugitive Prince and Princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

45.name: 127 Hours
45.description: An adventurous mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

46.name: The A-Team
46.description: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

47.name: The Fighter
47.description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

48.name: The Book of Eli
48.description: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

49.name: Valentine's Day
49.description: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

50.name: Get Him to the Greek
50.description: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.
